LanguageData.BasicProsthetics.label: Basic prosthetics
LanguageData.BasicProsthetics.description: Understanding the shape of a leg and combining that knowledge with basic woodworking, you can now craft peg legs and other basic prostheses.
LanguageData.SimpleProsthetics.label: Simple prosthetics workbench
LanguageData.SimpleProsthetics.description: Advanced anatomy studies and metal testing will allow you to build simple prostheses.
LanguageData.Bionics.label: bionics workbench
LanguageData.Bionics.description: Discovering the concept of very small motors and circuits, new possibilities of better prostheses are now open for you.
LanguageData.SurrogateOrgans.label: tissue printer
LanguageData.SurrogateOrgans.description: Gaining higher medical and technical knowledge, creating a 3D printer to craft simple surrogate organs becomes possible.
LanguageData.RibReplacements.label: rib replacements
LanguageData.RibReplacements.description: Discovering the concept of very small dispensers, you think about putting them in ribs. You can now craft and install rib implants.
LanguageData.EnergizedComponents.label: energized components
LanguageData.EnergizedComponents.description: You can now energize components at component assembly bench, which could power more complex prostheses.
LanguageData.AdvancedBionics.label: advanced bionics
LanguageData.AdvancedBionics.description: Upgrade regular bionics with vancidium to make them even better. Unlocks new recipes on the bionics workbench.
LanguageData.SyntheticOrgans.label: synthetic organs
LanguageData.SyntheticOrgans.description: Further research in nano-technology allows you to print incredibly well-engineered artificial organs. Unlocks new recipes on the tissue printer.
LanguageData.BrainSurgery.label: brain surgery
LanguageData.BrainSurgery.description: Allows you to perform surgery on the brain.
